Of all of the Indian places I've been in my life, including going to India itself, these guys know how to cook some damn food.  Hands down the best Indian food I have ever had.  On top of that, the staff is always friendly and grateful for your business...  Great people.  I'm not one to break down every grain of rice, so I will just say this:  if you're looking for EXCELLENT authentic Indian food and a very friendly staff that remembers you, this is the place.
